snippet: Federal prosecutors in Manhattan filed papers against three former New York City councilmen and a former Yonkers councilwoman.
abstract: Federal prosecutors in Manhattan file court papers as part of effort to forfeit or be reimbursed for the pensions of former New York Councilmen Miguel Martinez and Larry Seabrook; also file papers against Hiram Monserrate, former New York councilman and state senator, and Sandy Annabi, former Yonkers councilwoman; all have been convicted on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in Manhattan filed papers against three former New York City councilmen and a former Yonkers councilwoman.

headline.main: U.S. Seeks Pensions of 4 Convicted of Corruption
headline.print_headline: Councilmen Found Guilty May Lose Pensions
